oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-07-27 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 27, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Porter Wagoner (host/performer), guest performers Benny Martin, and the Collins Kids, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, the Jordanaires, June Carter, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. June talks about Johnny Cash during her performance. It is announced that this is the 929th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Porter Wagoner; Rod Brasfield; Benny Martin; Jordanaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Porter Wagoner -- Pay Day (Porter Wagoner) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Porter Wagoner) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Porter Wagoner) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Benny Martin -- Torch Of Love (Benny Martin, Jordanaires) -- Prince Albert commercial (Porter Wagoner, Rod Brasfield) -- Porter Wagoner talks -- Turkey In The Straw -- Porter Wagoner talks -- What Would You Do (If Jesus Came To Your House) (Porter Wagoner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Jordanaires (Musical group); Stringbean, 1915-1973; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Wagoner, Porter; Martin, Benny; Collins Kids (Musical group); Collins, Larry, 1944-; Collins, Lorrie
